data.actual_result: When you rotate your screen back from sideways, all users pop up for a split second.
data.short_description: All users pop up for a split second when you rotate your search results on a search content that doesn't have a result.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit log, and filter users. - Then, search something that shouldn't give a result (example, aeoifjaosejf). - Once you get the result, rotate your screen sideways, then rotate it back.
